DSA Event 2022

18th - 22nd July, 2022

Theme: Data, Technology and Community

Become a speaker

Highlights

Embedded ML - Tiny ML

TinyML is a cutting-edge field that brings the transformative power of machine learning (ML) to the performance- and power-constrained domain of tiny devices and embedded systems. Successful deployment in this field requires intimate knowledge of applications, algorithms, hardware, and software.

Summer School

In the tradition of previous Data Science Africa events, a summer school on machine learning and data science will be held prior to the main workshop. This summer school will target graduate students, researchers and professionals working with huge amounts of data or unique datasets.

Workshop

The workshop will be organized around paper presentations and interactive panel discussions. The theme for the workshop is Women and Data in Africa. We want to highlight the work of women data scientists and increase representation of women in Data Science in Africa. We strongly encourage the participation of women from across the continent.

Locations where DSA events have been and are planned to be held plus when they were/will be held.
